extendedInfo.description: The monsters have been eating way too much junk food, and now theyâre hungry for something healthy â you! Take your team of valiant veggies into battle as you attempt to keep the monsters from invading your plot.An action-packed game of good food versus bad diet, featuring fast, intense gameplay as you repel the ravenous monsters using your powerful veggie catapult. Itâs eat or be eaten in Grow Away!POWERFUL PERISHABLESArmed only with a touch-powered catapult, you are the last line of leafy defense as a herd of herbaceous-hunting monsters storm the veggiesâ homeland. Load different types of gallant greenery into your catapult and pound your enemies with powerful produce before itâs too late and they plow through your gardenâs barricades.VARIED VEGGIESNine types of vegetables are available in Grow Away to help you repel the greedy invaders. The irrepressible onion that makes your enemies cry in terror, the brave tomato that makes a marvelous mess of your opposition, the fearless garlic that lingers on the battlefield and many other gallant gardening goods are all ready to go to war against the malnourished monsters.FOUR EDIBLE ENVIRONMENTSThe fight between the organic heroes and mutated monsters spans four different worlds as you attempt to defend your armored allotment. The Green Plains, Plague Jungle, Chili Mountain and the Yellow Stone Ridge are all under assault, so take command of the vegetable army and put the animal aggressors out to pasture once and for all.Grow Away is a fun and addictive game for all the family, with outstanding comic book graphics, cute characters and thrilling touchscreen-controlled, catapult-pounding gameplay. Join in the action-packed feast of good food versus bad diet, and make those malnourished monsters eat their greens whether they want to or not!For more information or support, please visit www.chillingo.com

reviews.title: Cute and addictive
reviews.comment: This game is too cute and just fun and I\'ve only played for a few minutes! It works good on my Android :D. Also not really experienceing difficulties with the gems. We\'ll see in future levels...
reviews.author: Karein Langdell

reviews.title: I love this game
reviews.comment: Fun but adds all the time. But still easy to get gems and coins . It would be cool to gain something during survival mode!
reviews.author: Kevin Abbath

reviews.title: Super cute!
reviews.comment: I actually like this better, than Angry Birds! Sound effects are cute and so are the vegetables. So far I have not had to use any real money to continue play. There are advertisements, but you can skip by them easy enough.
reviews.author: Sara MCKINLEY

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: I like it but its kinda like hard at times and at other times annoying. But overall .... I love it
reviews.author: Ddog Mittelstedt

reviews.comment: 2 hard to earn gems needed for upgrades. If you want good weps u need to buy gems with real money. I don\'t like in app purchase games. Deleting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Another ZvP shooter style
reviews.comment: If you like angry birds then this is the game for you. Good causal gaming enjoyable and you dont need real cash to play the game; unlike like most other games that trys to forces you to pay to make the game enjoyable or even playable.
reviews.author: John Cong

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Kinda laggy at times. But all in all a pretty well made game. Also happy it\'s free. :)
reviews.author: Jonathan Price

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Fun game really nice so far
reviews.author: Jeremy Foster

reviews.title: Adorable and entertaining
reviews.comment: Simplistic game play with adorable graphics, plenty of levels and challenging!
reviews.author: Tasha Kavanagh

reviews.title: Quite the fun addiction!
reviews.comment: Super fun and addicting game with lots of cute elements as well. Definitely recommend the download (: !
reviews.author: Myla Shadrina

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: Revised: was willing to $0.99 for gems but when u are ready to accept the price it says $19.99...For 60 gems!     Basic fling Em concept as angry birds but much cuter and much more fun. Love the cute characters and noises.
reviews.author: Stacie Hosler

reviews.title: Nice game and fun
reviews.comment: Pretty good game, easy to play, fun too.  Nice graphics and cute concept.
reviews.author: Doug Char

reviews.title: Addictive & captivating
reviews.comment: This is a very fun & addictive game! Me and my sons can\'t get enough of it! We\'ve downloaded to our tablet. There are still a few bugs and kinks but its not serious enough to write off a wholesome game like Grow Away!
reviews.author: Tamarra Jenkins

reviews.title: This game would be amazing, but...
reviews.comment: ...it lags horribly. I use an LG MyTouch, and every other game I have works fine. This game also has an irritating advertisement that pops up on every load screen, asking you to click it to test your phone speed. I find it suspicious that the only ap I have that slows my phone down keeps pestering me to test my phone\'s speed, because \"it may be slowing down.\" Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Brittney Matchett

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait for next update
reviews.author: Thomas Tirado

reviews.comment: Its a pretty good game to pass the time
reviews.author: Torie Emma

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Pretty good except the annoying tomato voices
reviews.author: Rose Symes

reviews.title: TBH
reviews.comment: Really fun game but needs to be easier to get gems otherwise it\'s too hard.
reviews.author: Ahaj Billgen

reviews.title: Grow away is a game to save vegs
reviews.comment: Its cute and they are giving me ten gems for this:)
reviews.author: Safwan Selim

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: Cuties game ever!!! My nieces never give me my phone cause of this game xD
reviews.author: Roy Alvarez-Cortez
